title: World Street Food Quiz
description: Match iconic street foods to their countries and cultures of origin

questions.question: Pad Thai, a stir-fried noodle dish, is the national dish of which country?
Empanadas, stuffed pastry turnovers, are a popular street food in which region?
Takoyaki, ball-shaped snacks filled with octopus, originate from which Japanese city?
Falafel, deep-fried balls made from chickpeas, is a staple street food in which region?
Pho, a fragrant noodle soup, is a beloved street food from which country?
Churros, fried dough pastries often dusted with sugar and cinnamon, originated in which country?
Jerk chicken, marinated and grilled over pimento wood, is a signature dish of which country?
Doner kebab, meat cooked on a vertical rotisserie, originated in which country?
Pani puri, hollow crispy shells filled with flavored water, is a popular street snack in which country?
Arepas, cornmeal cakes that can be stuffed with various fillings, are popular in which countries?
Banh mi, a sandwich on a baguette with Vietnamese fillings, reflects the culinary influence of which colonial power?
Crepes, thin pancakes served sweet or savory, are a famous street food in which country?
Satay, skewered and grilled meat with peanut sauce, is popular street food in which region?
Bunny chow, a hollowed-out bread loaf filled with curry, originated in which South African city?
Pierogi, filled dumplings, are a beloved street food and national dish of which country?
